```{r}
library(png)
library(grid)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
plotTarget <- function(x,y){
  
  d <- data.frame(x = x, y = y)
  r <- png::readPNG('Room6.png')
  rg <- grid::rasterGrob(r, width=unit(1,"npc"), height=unit(1,"npc"))
  
  ggplot(d, aes(x,y)) + 
    annotation_custom(rg) +
    geom_point(colour="red", type = 'p', pch = 13, cex = 4,) +
    scale_x_continuous(expand=c(0,0), lim=c(-300,300)) +
    scale_y_continuous(expand=c(0,0), lim=c(-300,300)) +
    theme_void() +
    theme(aspect.ratio = nrow(r)/ncol(r))
}
plotTarget(0, 0)
```
